Great spot to stay. A little difficult to get the temperature where you want it but other than that it was as described.

Beautiful location. Recommend for touring Rapid City and surrounding areas
Perfect little barn for our stay! Cute, quaint, and could see the hills in the distance. Would stay again!

Thank you!

Beautiful location! Cozy little house!

Clean, comfortable bed & furnishings; accurately represented.
We really enjoyed our trip to the Black Hills! This home was the cutest and the surroundings were even better! We had an excellent stay!

Beautiful views and great distance away from the city and the hills!

Excellent setup, perfectly stocked.
Good host. Cool place.
Beautiful and quiet place for a little getaway. We loved it!

Thank you so much for the space to enjoy a couple of quiet days. It was a very nice escape for some much needed R&R. The bed slept so well, and the cleanliness of the home made it enjoyable and comfortable. Thank you for making this stay so wonderful!

If you are wanting a place to stay that is quiet and clean with a beautiful view and a minimal drive, this is the place. J&J are great to work with and genuinely enjoy hospitality. Don‚Äôt take my word for it though. Book your stay today and find out for yourself.

Stay was great!

What a GREAT location! The barn was amazing and the views were great!
Perfect location, excellent view, and plenty of wildlife. Sits in the middle of everything the Black Hills has to offer. we definitely be back. 5 Star!

Nice location, very clean, well decorated.

Great location. Great host. Great property.

5 stars across the board! My husband and I had an amazing time staying at J&J Hospitality. Very clean, Great views, and Wonderful communication from them. This place is a true gem. The views are breathtaking and the barn is a perfect stay. We have two children- they slept on the pull out couch and were fine. A great place for families.
This was a perfect place to stay. It‚Äôs in a great location. I just wished we could have stayed longer to enjoy the place.

Excellent communication and accommodations. Wouldn‚Äôt change a thing about our stay, the lodging, or especially the views. Still within Uber/Lyft range from town, but feels very secluded and private. Will be staying here again next time through town!!!
Great location with a beautiful view! Our hostess thought of everything!

Great stay! Unique place, clean, and pretty location.

Super nice!

When driving to this home we were so excited to have some peace and quiet and great views as the post says and portrays. Upon arrival we were instantly bummed. The backside of the property is right on a busy road. When sitting outside all you hear are cars driving by. When we walked around to the back porch that has the "view" there is a new build house obstructing the "view" that was not in the pictures. The owners house is steps from the porch. When we were sitting on the patio we could hear the owner doing dishes and see her standing in the window looking at us. On that side of the owners house is also a living room window and we could see them sitting on the couch. Another thing that caught us off guard was the Ring system they had installed to see every time a renter comes and go's from the property. We felt as if we were being watched and or listened to. The rental was clean other than the tub (it had a dirt ring around it that I cleaned before using) and some trash that was stuck in the bushes on the patio. This rental does not have a stocked kitchen like other rentals we have been in. So if your planning to cook, bring everything you need down to the spices and something to store leftovers in. Jordan was responsive and listened to our concerns about the property not being what was portrayed but Josephine never responded when reached out to. Jordan did offer one of their other properties for a night to try and make things right. This home is nice but if you are looking for peace and quiet, this is not the property.
